channel.title: how to use the whonix gateway with windows 7 in virtualbox
channel.description: I know this has probably been asked so many times but how do I configure the whonix gateway to work with windows 7 and make it just as secure as the whonix workstation.

item.title: how to use the whonix gateway with windows 7 in virtualbox
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not possible. See, Windows Hosts:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Computer_Security_Education#Windows_Hosts

Read full topic
item.source: how to use the whonix gateway with windows 7 in virtualbox
